title: RP
body: Why I can not buy RP with my VIZA card ... I am Cambodia .... Can u tell me how to buy RP with my VIZA card pls

replies.body:
Since this is a billing issue, I recommend reaching out to our billing team by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We'll be able to work with you better there and find a solution together that will work.

Let me know if you have any questions.
